text: no position update from roaring Kitty but a fascinating day in the options chain I want to walk through the position that he has and what it looks like today even though we haven't seen the latest I'm going off of what he shared previously but then I definitely want to dive into what I'm seeing in the options chain because there's some really really interesting activity that can have some pretty significant implications for what we're seeing in GameStop so let's Dive Right In right now what I've done is kind of crossed out the last prices and updated with what they are as of now even though technically GameStop is right around 26 after hours it closed at 2546 so left it there and then the 20 calls that he has they're trading for 635 this is the mid price this is really important to drive home this mid price is not what he would get if he chose to close all 120,000 of these calls because as he starts unwinding this the market would start to move so what that means is I'm quoting it at the midpoint that's not what he actually would be able to execute at that doesn't mean that he would be completely eviscerated and not be able to make a market obviously the market makers will provide a market but it's just important to note that this would look slightly different if he chooses to liquidate the position all at once which
